description:
buildscripts: move to buildscript directory
        Fixes issue 2717.

messages.text:
Hello r@golang.org, rsc@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/
Shouldn't this CL include deletions too?

I just 'hg mv' them, and I think the codereview site has a bug in handling
these file renames.
(Of course, 'hg clpatch' works as intended.)

On Tue, Jan 17, 2012 at 3:31 PM, David Symonds <dsymonds@golang.org> wrote:

> Shouldn't this CL include deletions too?
>

*** Submitted as c6a9cca90e40 ***

buildscripts: move to buildscript directory
        Fixes issue 2717.

R=r, rsc, dsymonds
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5545069

Committer: Russ Cox <rsc@golang.org>

subject: code review 5545069: buildscripts: move to buildscript directory
